name: eslint-plugin-granular-selectors
description: ESLint plugin to enforce granular store selectors for Redux and Zustand

scripts.test:eslint5: npm i eslint@5.16.0 mocha@5.2.0 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test:eslint6: npm i eslint@6.8.0 mocha@7.2.0 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test:eslint7: npm i eslint@7.32.0 mocha@8.4.0 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test:eslint8: npm i eslint@8.38.0 mocha@10.2.0 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test:eslint9: npm i eslint@9.31.0 mocha@10.2.0 --no-save && npm test

author: vrsttl
